title: SHUSMA SWARAJ DELEGATION WHICH VISITED SRILANKA RECOMMENDS 13TH AMENDMENT OF THE CONSTITUTION SHOULD BE IMPLEMENTED
content: Onlanka News –  By Walter Jayawardhana The Indian parliamentary delegation who visited Sri Lanka met Prime Minister Dr. Manmohan Singh and other leaders of the NewDelhi government and recommended  the 13th amendment of the Sri Lanka Constitution should be implemented….
